rationales.achievement: He delivers a critical migration early and centers pride in reliable execution.
rationales.conformity: He accepts recognition imbalance as 'how things work' instead of challenging team dynamics.
He withholds dissent in standup to avoid friction with a senior architect who resists pushback.
rationales.self_direction: He does not act on his own technical judgment in the meeting despite having evidence.
rationales.security: He chooses low-conflict documentation as protective risk management ('paper trail') rather than direct confrontation.

rationales.achievement: He compiles concrete performance metrics and prepares a stronger self-assessment to compete for advancement.
rationales.conformity: He adapts his language to fit formal review norms even though self-promotion feels culturally uncomfortable.

rationales.achievement: He articulates substantial contributions and submits a more assertive performance narrative.
rationales.conformity: He deliberately adopts the organization's expected communication style to be legible in its promotion system.

rationales.achievement: He secures internal support for the director track after sustained delivery and stronger self-advocacy.
rationales.conformity: He recognizes success came from expressing achievements in the institution's preferred format.

rationales.achievement: He submits a complete director application and organizational redesign proposal.
rationales.conformity: He intentionally keeps critique diplomatic to fit panel expectations and maximize acceptance.

rationales.achievement: He approaches the interview with structured preparation for a high-stakes promotion outcome.
rationales.conformity: He emphasizes disciplined, norm-safe delivery ('didn't improvise, didn't overshoot') to align with panel preferences.
